report.title: List of all dynamic sample attributes
report.description: Lists sample attributes that are dynamically linked so that they will only appear for records of a particular branch of taxa
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM sample_attributes a JOIN sample_attributes_websites aw ON aw.sample_attribute_id=a.id AND aw.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_taxon_restrictions atr ON atr.sample_attributes_website_id=aw.id AND atr.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.taxon_meaning_id=atr.restrict_to_taxon_meaning_id AND cttl.preferred=true AND cttl.taxon_list_id=#master_checklist_id# LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.termlist_id=a.termlist_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tdefault ON tdefault.id=aw.default_int_value AND a.data_type='L' LEFT JOIN form_structure_blocks fsb ON fsb.id=aw.form_structure_block_id LEFT JOIN form_structure_blocks fsbp ON fsbp.id=fsb.parent_id LEFT JOIN control_types ct ON ct.id = aw.control_type_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms l2cat ON l2cat.id=a.reporting_category_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms l2cati18n ON l2cati18n.meaning_id=l2cat.meaning_id AND l2cati18n.language='#language#' LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms l1cat ON l1cat.id=l2cat.parent_id and l1cat.preferred=true LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms l1cati18n ON l1cati18n.meaning_id=l1cat.meaning_id AND l1cati18n.language='#language#' #joins# WHERE a.deleted=false

param.name: master_checklist_id
param.display: Taxon list ID of the master checklist

column.name: default_value
column.sql: CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN aw.default_text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN aw.default_int_value::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN aw.default_int_value::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN aw.default_int_value::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN aw.default_float_value::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN aw.default_date_start_value::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN vague_date_to_raw_string(aw.default_date_start_value, aw.default_date_end_value, aw.default_date_type_value)::text ELSE null::text END

column.name: default_upper_value
column.sql: CASE WHEN a.data_type IN ('I', 'F') AND a.allow_ranges=true THEN aw.default_upper_value ELSE null::float END
